long_description: Designed for the high-angle paddling style, the Aqua-Bound Manta Ray paddle's broad blades supply huge bite and power for athletic touring, workout paddling and racing. Combination of aluminum shaft and fiberglass-reinforced nylon blades deliver a flutter-free, high-power stroke with easy swing-weight. Wide, asymmetrical dihedral blade face is optimized for the high-angle paddling style. Grooves on the ferrule prevent sand and sludge build-up, maintaining a tight, trouble-free ferrule for years of use. 2-piece design of the Aqua-bound Manta Ray paddle breaks down for easy storage and transport. Feathering is adjustable to 60-degrees right-hand control or unfeathered.
short_description: Designed for the high-angle paddling style, the Aqua-Bound Manta Ray paddle's broad blades supply huge bite and power for athletic touring, workout paddling and racing.
